fiora package¶

Submodules¶

fiora.skeleton module¶

This is the main entry point of the application.

fiora.skeleton.setup_logging(loglevel)[source]¶

Setup basic logging

Parameters:

loglevel (int) – minimum loglevel for emitting messages
